biotools.summary: DeepBSA is a bulked segregant analysis (BSA) software for the dissection of complex traits. Two algorithms are developed in DeepBSA named deep learning (DL) and k-value (K), which can be applied on different number (at least 2) of bulked pools.

bioschemas.name: DeepBSA
bioschemas.summary: DeepBSA is a bulked segregant analysis (BSA) software for the dissection of complex traits. Two algorithms are developed in DeepBSA named deep learning (DL) and k-value (K), which can be applied on different number (at least 2) of bulked pools.
